attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many people around the world have come together to try and stop modern slavery in places like Africa. Many chocolate companies use trafficking. They move people, especially children aged 9-14 to working grounds. There they work day in, day out gathering and planting cocoa beans, etc. If slavery was stopped before, why can't we stop it now?
 
This is not right and together we can stop it.
